generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending from the foreground into the distance, with vehicles and pedestrians present.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right edge of the road, adjacent to a stone wall and a parked car, and also along the left side where pedestrians are walking.
- building: Several buildings are visible, including a multi-story building with windows and posters on the left, and a stone building on the right.
- vegetation: Trees and a hedge are visible along the road, providing shade and separating the road from the buildings.
- person: A man in an orange shirt is walking on the road, and another person is riding a bicycle on the left side of the road.
- car: A silver SUV is parked on the right side of the road, and other cars are visible parked along the left side of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign (P) is visible on the right side of the road, and a 30 km/h speed limit sign is also visible further down the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including a pole with posters on the left side of the road and a pole with a parking sign on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is being ridden by a person on the left side of the road.
